Name: Anna
Review Text: The best restaurant we've been to in the centre of Amsterdam. Reasonably priced for the standard of food. We had the steak, risotto and brownie which were all delicious.

Review Text: Food is not bad, not spectacular and in small potion. Service is prompt and quite attentive.

Name: Anna
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, very good service, but not impressed with the food. Chose the seasonal dish (duck) and it was very ordinary, something you could've cooked yourself. But I would've probably been more impressed of I had chosen the regular dishes or the 3 course menu.

Name: Anna

Name: Anna
Review Text: Nice place, delicious staff, very polite and kind waitresses...  but what's about the reason I seated? Food is the real thing I looked for, and I was really disappointed! Taste missing at all! C'mon, how can you evaluate the place above average? Too much smoke before dinner I guess

Name: Anna
Review Text: We enjoyed our dinner a mountain! The location is superb, the food very tasty and well presented. The staff would have made the fifth star had they been a bit more approachable. We published a full review on our travel blog travelmemo-com

Review Text: It was a great restaurant and I wanted to book, but as you'll see, their website is ... weird, and they weren't answering the phone. So I walked over there: it's gone. No sign of it, even difficult to recognize which building it used to be in. Alas.

Name: Anna
Review Text: We had a gorgeous meal here recentely . I would recommend that you book a table before your trip as its well worth it . Excellent food and such lovely staff . Well done all around . We will be back again .

Name: Anna
Review Text: Excellent multi course menus. Overall experience too slow (2h for 4 course meal). Can also sit in Bistro and order a la carte. Fun restroom.

Review Text: Excellent food! Great service! (Just avoid ordering the tartar, that was sort of lame)! Definitely worth the visit!

Name: Anna
